items.sentence: I\'m the one who convinced Tom that he should learn how to do that.
Tom realized he didn\'t have enough time to do what had to be done.
Tom is the only one here who\'s tall enough to reach the top shelf.
Tom never worried about where his next meal was going to come from.
Tom plays the baritone saxophone and Mary plays the alto saxophone.
I\'m definitely the person who should be doing this instead of Tom.
Tom said that Mary was driving the car at the time of the accident.
Do you think Tom will still be able to do that after the operation?
Tom tried to lift the box by himself, but he wasn\'t strong enough.
We would have fewer problems if we did this the way Tom told us to.
